country.description: User Country (same as residence field) - deprecated

citizen.description: Country of legal citizenship, 2-letter country code.

salutation.description: Salutation (note: not set for virtual-money accounts)

first_name.description: First name (note: not set for virtual-money accounts)

last_name.description: Last name (note: not set for virtual-money accounts)

date_of_birth.description: Epoch of user's birthday (note: not set for virtual-money accounts)

address_line_1.description: Address line 1 (note: not set for virtual-money accounts)

address_line_2.description: Address line 2 (note: not set for virtual-money accounts)

address_city.description: City (note: not set for virtual-money accounts)

address_state.description: State (note: not set for virtual-money accounts)

address_postcode.description: Post Code (note: not set for virtual-money accounts)

phone.description: Telephone (note: not set for virtual-money accounts)

is_authenticated_payment_agent.description: Boolean value 1 or 0, indicating whether is payment agent (note: not applicable for virtual money accounts)

email_consent.description: Boolean value 1 or 0, indicating permission to use email address for any contact which may include marketing

allow_copiers.description: Boolean value 1 or 0, indicating permission to allow others to follow your trades. Note: not applicable for Virtual account. Only allow for real money account.

request_professional_status.description: Boolean value 1 or 0, indicating if client has requested professional status.

client_tnc_status.description: Latest terms and conditions version accepted by client

tax_residence.description: Residence for tax purpose. Comma separated iso country code if multiple jurisdictions. Only applicable for real money account.

tax_identification_number.description: Tax identification number. Only applicable for real money account.

account_opening_reason.description: Purpose and reason for requesting the account opening. Only applicable for real money account.

user_hash.description: Hash generated using user details to verify whether the user is legitimate for our customer support system.

has_secret_answer.description: Returns 1 if the client has a secret answer, 0 otherwise.

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
